Welcome to Jekyll!

27 Aug 2013

You'll find this post in your_postsdirectory - edit this post and re-build (or run with the-wswitch) to see your changes!To add new posts, simply add a file in the_postsdirectory that follows the convention: YYYY-MM-DD-name-of-post.ext.

Jekyll also offers powerful support for code snippets:

def print_hi(name)
  puts "Hi, #{name}"
end
print_hi('Tom')
#=> prints 'Hi, Tom' to STDOUT.

Check out the Jekyll docs for more info on how to get the most out of Jekyll. File all bugs/feature requests at Jekyll's GitHub repo.
